about_the_game:
" Chosen War" is a roguelike strategy game full of randomness. You'll take on the role of the Chosen One, build and lead your army to explore various islands. Through tactical deployment, you'll engage in battles with enemies, skillfully utilize abilities, and achieve victory with minimal losses.

Dangerous Forks in the Road

All the islands are shrouded in mist. Only the islands you've visited reveal the surrounding conditions. When you encounter a fork in the road, which path leads to the island of the Mad Priest? If you choose the wrong one, do you have enough rations to get back on the right track? Will you use items, your wits, or perhaps courage to turn the situation around?

Troop Enhancements

When you step onto a mysterious island and after a fierce battle, the God of Spaghetti will bestow upon you the rewards you've earned. You can choose one of three troop enhancements. When the same troop type obtains its third enhancement, a qualitative

change occurs. Of course, the God of Spaghetti knows you might not be satisfied with the enhancements presented, so it gives you a chance to refresh them. But why does it cost gold coins? Does even the god need gold coins?

The Cunning Merchant

On the shop island, there is a cunning merchant who resides there permanently. He seems to possess powerful magic but only has his eyes on the gold coins in your hands. You can purchase various magic items and troops from him. Even better, for just some gold coins, you can immediately master some powerful skills.

The Altar of Miracles

Your fallen warriors will become heroic spirits. The God of Spaghetti has set up resurrection altars imbued with miraculous power, along with a coin - slot, on some islands. With just a few gold coins, you can resurrect your heroic spirits. However, the newly - resurrected warriors seem a bit weak. Of course, even if you don't spend the gold coins, the great God of Spaghetti will ensure that your surviving army benefits from the miracle's curative effects.

Imprisoned Slaves

Warriors of various races are imprisoned in a gloomy jail by the enemies on the island. Defeat the enemies, break the prison, rescue these warriors, and bring them under your command.

Island Transitions

Besides using your small boat to slide to other islands, you can also teleport from one sugar - triangle island crackling with lightning to another such island. This allows you to travel long distances without consuming rations.

Abundant Treasures

The God of Spaghetti has hidden abundant treasures on some islands. Of course, you're not the only one attracted by the treasures. The enemies have also stationed stronger troops to guard the treasures. Eliminate them and seize the treasures!

A One - of - a - Kind Adventure

Each of your adventures is unique. You'll face randomly - generated enemies, routes, rewards, etc. Confront unknown challenges, explore routes to the final island, and make your choices!
